title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 10 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 10 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: My soul is weary of my life; I will leave my complaint upon myself; I will speak in the bitterness of my soul.
lineList.cn: 我厌烦我的性命，必由着自己述说我的哀情。因心里苦恼，我要说话。

lineList.en: I will say unto God, Do not condemn me; shew me wherefore thou contendest with me.
lineList.cn: 对神说，不要定我有罪。要指示我，你为何与我争辩。

lineList.en: Is it good unto thee that thou shouldest oppress, that thou shouldest despise the work of thine hands, and shine upon the counsel of the wicked?
lineList.cn: 你手所造的，你又欺压，又藐视，却光照恶人的计谋。这事你以为美吗。

lineList.en: Hast thou eyes of flesh? or seest thou as man seeth?
lineList.cn: 你的眼岂是肉眼，你查看岂像人查看吗。

lineList.en: Are thy days as the days of man? are thy years as man's days,
lineList.cn: 你的日子岂像人的日子，你的年岁岂像人的年岁。

lineList.en: That thou enquirest after mine iniquity, and searchest after my sin?
lineList.cn: 就追问我的罪孽，寻察我的罪过吗。

lineList.en: Thou knowest that I am not wicked; and there is none that can deliver out of thine hand.
lineList.cn: 其实，你知道我没有罪恶，并没有能救我脱离你手的。

lineList.en: Thine hands have made me and fashioned me together round about; yet thou dost destroy me.
lineList.cn: 你的手创造我，造就我的四肢百体，你还要毁灭我。

lineList.en: Remember, I beseech thee, that thou hast made me as the clay; and wilt thou bring me into dust again?
lineList.cn: 求你记念制造我如抟泥一般，你还要使我归于麈土吗。

lineList.en: Hast thou not poured me out as milk, and curdled me like cheese?
lineList.cn: 你不是倒出我来好像奶，使我凝结如同奶饼吗。

lineList.en: Thou hast clothed me with skin and flesh, and hast fenced me with bones and sinews.
lineList.cn: 你以皮和肉为衣给我穿上，用骨与筋把我全体联络。

lineList.en: Thou hast granted me life and favour, and thy visitation hath preserved my spirit.
lineList.cn: 你将生命和慈爱赐给我，你也眷顾保全我的心灵。

lineList.en: And these things hast thou hid in thine heart: I know that this is with thee.
lineList.cn: 然而，你待我的这些事早已藏在你心里，我知道你久有此意。

lineList.en: If I sin, then thou markest me, and thou wilt not acquit me from mine iniquity.
lineList.cn: 我若犯罪，你就察看我，并不赦免我的罪孽。

lineList.en: If I be wicked, woe unto me; and if I be righteous, yet will I not lift up my head. I am full of confusion; therefore see thou mine affliction;
lineList.cn: 我若行恶，便有了祸。我若为义，也不敢抬头。正是满心羞愧，眼见我的苦情。

lineList.en: For it increaseth. Thou huntest me as a fierce lion: and again thou shewest thyself marvellous upon me.
lineList.cn: 我若昂首自得，你就追捕我如狮子，又在我身上显出奇能。

lineList.en: Thou renewest thy witnesses against me, and increasest thine indignation upon me; changes and war are against me.
lineList.cn: 你重立见证攻击我，向我加增恼怒，如军兵更换着攻击我。

lineList.en: Wherefore then hast thou brought me forth out of the womb? Oh that I had given up the ghost, and no eye had seen me!
lineList.cn: 你为何使我出母胎呢。不如我当时气绝，无人得见我。

lineList.en: I should have been as though I had not been; I should have been carried from the womb to the grave.
lineList.cn: 这样，就如没有我一般，一出母胎就被送入坟墓。

lineList.en: Are not my days few? cease then, and let me alone, that I may take comfort a little,
lineList.cn: 我的日子不是甚少吗。求你停手宽容我，叫我在往而不返之先，

lineList.en: Before I go whence I shall not return, even to the land of darkness and the shadow of death;
lineList.cn: 就是往黑暗，和死荫之地以先，可以稍得畅快。

lineList.en: A land of darkness, as darkness itself; and of the shadow of death, without any order, and where the light is as darkness.
lineList.cn: 那地甚是幽暗，是死荫混沌之地。那里的光好像幽暗。
